[h1]Removing Elements[/h1] To remove an HTML element, you must select the parent of the element and use the [b]removeChild[/b](node) method. [b]For example:[/b] [code format="html" codeId="959"]

This is a paragraph.

This is another paragraph.

[/code] This removes the paragraph with id="p1" from the page. [note]An alternative way of achieving the same result would be the use of the [b]parentNode [/b]property to get the parent of the element we want to remove: var child = document.getElementById("p1"); child.[b]parentNode[/b].removeChild(child);[/note]
